name: Ball 2D: Soccer Online
description: Ball 2D is all about reflex and strategy. Are you good enough to master the game?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0 support (almost all graphics cards) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
